headline.main: Free Trade of the South with Europe.

docs.snippet: The news from Texas, which we publish this morning, indicates that Mexico is not disposed quietly to wait to be conquered by the Southern Confederacy, but is determined rather to take the initiative, and endeavor to conquer the Southern Confederacy...
docs.lead_paragraph: The news from Texas, which we publish this morning, indicates that Mexico is not disposed quietly to wait to be conquered by the Southern Confederacy, but is determined rather to take the initiative, and endeavor to conquer the Southern Confederacy or at any rate Texas.

docs.lead_paragraph: BILLS PASSED. For the preservation of moose, wild deer, birds and fish.

headline.main: CITY AND COUNTY AFFAIRS.; BOARD OF ALDERMEN. THE QUESTION OF COURT-ROOMS CURIOUS CHARGES OF CORRUPTION MADE BY ALDERMAN BRADY.

docs.lead_paragraph: At the meeting of the Board of Aldermen, last evening, a resolution was offered providing that the rooms now occupied by the Supreme Court and District-Attorney, in the brown-stone building in the Park, be set apart for the Superior Court, so soon as provision shall be made for the Supreme Court by the Supervisors, under the recent act of the Legislature.

headline.main: OUR WASHINGTON CORRESPONDENCE.; THE ANGLO FRENCH FLEET WHAT IT IS INTENDED TO EFFECT THE SPANISH RAID ON SAN DOMINGO UNION STRENGTH IN TENNESSEE AND NORTH CAROLINA, ETC.

docs.lead_paragraph: The latest news from Europe, as contained in the letter of your Paris correspondent, relative to the fitting out of a powerful fleet of war steamers by England and France, to be sent to the United States, and the not less interesting information which comes from the West Indies, regarding the annexation of St. Domingo to Spain, are of special importance to the Southern Confederacy, ...

headline.main: ARRIVAL OF THE AFRICA.; 110,000 IN SPECIE. Further Discussion of American Topics in England. THE KOSSUTH HUNGARIAN NOTES. Death of the Mother of the Queen. EXCITING DEBATES IN THE FRENCH CHAMBERS, RUSSIA AND POLAND. Later from India and China.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Royal mail steamship Africa, from Liverpool at 10 A.M. on the 16th inst., and from Queenstown on the evening of the l7th March, arrived here yesterday morning, bringing 110,000 specle. The Nova Scotian and Kangaroo arrived at Liverpool, and the Saxonia at Southampton on the 14th March.
